title: OSHA Standards for General Industry
description: Intro to OSHA standards and employer responsibilities for general industry.

title: OSHA 30 — General Industry
description: 30‑hour outreach training for supervisors and safety leads in general industry.

title: OSHA 10 — General Industry
description: 10‑hour outreach training for entry‑level workers in general industry.

title: HAZWOPER 40‑Hour
description: 40‑hour hazardous waste operations and emergency response training.

title: HAZWOPER 24‑Hour (Occasional Site Worker)
description: 24‑hour hazardous waste operations training for occasional site workers.

title: Hazard Communication (GHS)
description: Right‑to‑Know and GHS hazard communication standard 1910.1200.

title: Personal Protective Equipment
description: Selection, use, and maintenance of PPE; fit and limitations.

title: Fire Safety Basics
description: Basics of fire prevention, classes of fire, extinguisher use (PASS).

title: Hot Work & Fire Watch
description: Permitting, hot work hazards, fire watch duties and response.

title: Ladder & Fall Protection
description: Portable ladders, scaffolds, and basic fall protection systems.

title: Ergonomics for Computer Work
description: Risk factors, neutral posture, micro‑breaks, and workstation setup.

title: Biosafety Level 1
description: Intro to biosafety principles for BSL‑1 labs; basic microbiological practices.

title: Biosafety Level 2
description: Enhanced practices for BSL‑2: sharps, access control, decontamination.

title: Bloodborne Pathogens
description: Exposure control plan, universal precautions, post‑exposure response.

title: Chemical Spill Response
description: Spill classification, SDS, neutralization/absorption, reporting, PPE.

title: Laboratory Safety Fundamentals
description: General lab rules, housekeeping, chemical hygiene plan, fume hoods.

title: Radiation Safety & ALARA
description: Radiation basics, ALARA principles, dosimetry, posting/signage.

title: Laser Safety (Class 2/3R)
description: Laser classifications, controls, alignment hazards, eye protection.

title: Lockout/Tagout (LOTO)
description: Energy control procedures, isolation, verification, group LOTO.

title: Powered Industrial Trucks (Forklift)
description: Safe operation, inspections, load handling, refueling/charging.

title: Respiratory Protection & Fit Test
description: Respirator types, medical evaluation, qualitative fit testing.

title: Heat Illness Prevention (CA)
description: Title 8 CCR §3395: hydration, shade, acclimatization, high‑heat.

title: Infectious Disease Prevention (General)
description: Controls for respiratory pathogens: hygiene, ventilation, PPE, reporting.

title: DOT HazMat Shipping Basics
description: Classification, packaging, marking/labeling, shipping papers.
